lastUpdated: Last updated on {{value, date}} at {{value, time}}
feedbackBanner: <0>This is a new service - your <0>feedback</0> will help us to improve it.</0>

trend.heading: {{heading}}
trend.alt_green_up: There has been an increase of {{change, number}} ({{percentage, number}}%) compared to the previous 7 days.
trend.alt_green_down: There has been a decrease of {{change, number}} ({{percentage, number}}%) compared to the previous 7 days.
trend.alt_red_up: There has been an increase of {{change, number}} ({{percentage, number}}%) compared to the previous 7 days.
trend.alt_red_down: There has been an decrease of {{change, number}} ({{percentage, number}}%) compared to the previous 7 days.

table.toggle: View data in a tabular format
table.caption: {{title}} data for {{body, lowerCaseFirstLetter}}

confirmation.title: Form submitted
confirmation.subtitle: Thank you for your feedback
confirmation.message: <0>Thank you for giving feedback on the UKHSA data dashboard. We'll use your comments to help us continually improve the service. We will not be able to get in touch with you about your comments.</0><1>The feedback form is intended for feedback on your experience using the dashboard. If you need to get in touch with UK Health Security Agency, you can find contact information at the bottom of the <0>UKHSA webpage</0></1>

cookieBanner.title: Cookies on UKHSA data dashboard
cookieBanner.body: <0>We use some essential cookies to make this service work.</0><1>We'd like to set additional cookies so we can remember your settings, understand how people use the service and make improvements.</1>
